# my-button

```html
<my-button color="primary" onClick="onButtonClick()" disabled="true">Example Text</my-button>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description       | Type                                 | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | ----------------- | ------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `color`    | `color`    | The button color  | `"accent" \| "default" \| "primary"` | `'default'` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | To disable button | `boolean`                            | `false`     |


## Events

| Event     | Description                    | Type                |
| --------- | ------------------------------ | ------------------- |
| `onClick` | Emitted when button is clicked | `CustomEvent<void>` |
